SCTX:
Begin plant2Script

;ENABLES/DISABLES TREE TO SIMULATE GROWTH

short currentDay
short daysPassed
short state

if ( state == 30 )
	return
endif

if ( player->GetDistance act_BM_Stone_Tree_01 <= 5000 )
	return
endif

if ( currentDay == Day )
	Return
endif

Set currentDay to Day
Set daysPassed to ( daysPassed + 1 )

if ( daysPassed >= 30 )
	if ( state == 20 )
		Act_BM_Tree_03->Enable
		Act_BM_Tree_02->Disable
		set state to 30
	endif
endif

if ( daysPassed >= 20 )
	if ( state == 10 )
		Act_BM_Tree_02->Enable
		Act_BM_Tree_01->Disable
		set state to 20
	endif
endif

if ( daysPassed >= 10 )
	if ( state == 0 )
		Act_BM_Tree_01->Enable
		set state to 10
	endif
endif



End plant2Script
